books.title: Gladiator
books.author: Philip Wylie
books.summary: A young man, given superhuman abilities by his scientist father, tries to find purpose and use for his powers.

books.title: The League of the Scarlet Pimpernel
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A collection of short stories featuring the Scarlet Pimpernel.

books.title: The Enormous Room
books.author: E. E. Cummings
books.summary: E. E. Cummings describes the experiences of his and his fellow inmates’ imprisonment during World War I.

books.title: A General History of the Pirates
books.author: Captain Charles Johnson
books.summary: The lives and stories of the daring pirate outlaws who terrorized the Atlantic Ocean and Caribbean Sea in the 18th century.

books.title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
books.author: Carlo Collodi
books.summary: A wooden puppet comes to life and goes on adventures.

books.title: Man and Superman
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: Jack Tanner flees both London and responsibility when he is made guardian of his childhood friend Ann Whitehead.

books.title: Pygmalion
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: An arrogant upper-class professor bets a colleague he can transform a simple flower girl into a “Duchess” in just six months.

books.title: A Princess of Mars
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: An adventurer finds himself battling alien civilizations on the strange surface of Mars.

books.title: The Iron Heel
books.author: Jack London
books.summary: In the far future, a long-lost manuscript describes how the United States descended into a tyranny ruled by oligarchic plutocrats.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Arthur Machen
books.summary: A collection of nine short fiction works by influential supernatural and horror author Arthur Machen.

books.title: The Life of Buffalo Bill
books.author: William F. Cody
books.summary: The 1879 autobiography of William F. Cody, more commonly known as Buffalo Bill, detailing his early life in the American West.

books.title: Murder in the Maze
books.author: J. J. Connington
books.summary: Twin brothers are found murdered in a maze, and the local Chief Constable must solve the crime.

books.title: Running a Thousand Miles for Freedom
books.author: William Craft
books.summary: The authors escape from slavery by posing as a slaveowner and his slave.

books.title: The Problems of Philosophy
books.author: Bertrand Russell
books.summary: A beginner’s guide to problems in various fields of philosophy.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Langston Hughes
books.summary: A collection of poems by Langston Hughes.

books.title: Captain Jinks, Hero
books.author: Ernest Howard Crosby
books.summary: A jingoistic military officer embarks on a tragicomic quest to become a “perfect soldier.”

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Fritz Leiber
books.summary: A collection of Fritz Leiber short stories and novellas ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Selma Lagerlöf
books.summary: A collection of Selma Lagerlöf’s translated short stories, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Practical Mysticism
books.author: Evelyn Underhill
books.summary: Evelyn Underhill makes the case that mysticism is accessible and beneficial to everyone.

books.title: Letters Written During a Short Residence in Sweden, Norway, and Denmark
books.author: Mary Wollstonecraft
books.summary: Mary Wollstonecraft’s account of her travels through Scandinavia.
